## TypesettingUtils.updateBounds() function

Updates the supplied bounds with the computed screen-space corners for a given glyph.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function updateBounds(corners: THREE.Vector3[], globalBounds: THREE.Box2, individualBounds?: {
        array: THREE.Box2[];
        offset: number;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  corners | THREE.Vector3\[\] | Glyph' corners. |
|  globalBounds | THREE.Box2 | Global text bounds. |
|  individualBounds | { array: THREE.Box2\[\]; offset: number; } | Individual per-character bounds. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
